@Reaper's Sorrow  actually, that becomes 63.4%. 
If the chance of a condom not failing is 99%, you do 0.99^100 to get 0.366 or 36.6%, and subtract that from 1 to get 63.4%, which is the chance of a condom failing at least once.

Honestly, the story is just meh. I could careless about what the guy and girl does. It’s just meh, that’s it. 

But, seeing all of these butthurt comments makes me laugh at emotionally sensitive you all are about this. Like, really? You might as well just call all yourselves, “the butthurt piss my pant bragate”, while you’re at it. 

P.S. Iexpectedbetter is a tryhard trying to act like a cool person. Just saying, you kiddies need to learn to grow up for once. 😎
